Title: Relates to recusal by a court of appeals judge
Summary: Provides that when a court of appeals judge recuses themselves from sitting in or taking part in the decision, action, claim, matter, motion or proceeding, a replacement shall be chosen on a rotating basis, based on seniority, of the next available appellate division judge.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to recusal by a court of appeals judge
